entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:18 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
